ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 279
ygData.msgSnippet: Trust.  I got to wear a Golden Black Pearl Choker for about an hour while I trucked around and sold it for my jeweler fiend.  Awesome boosts. Sylly. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Trust. I got to wear a Golden Black Pearl Choker for about an hour while I
trucked around and sold it for my jeweler fiend. Awesome boosts.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:WebberJ@...]
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 1:44 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 279

From: "Webber, Jessica" <WebberJ@...>

> If you ever get a black pearl or a diamond as loot
DON'T
> sell them!

So, assuming I ever find myself fingering a black pearl in
my pocket &
negotiating a price with some jeweler, any recommendations
for how to cover
myself in case a) the jeweler fails, or b) the jeweler
claims they failed,
or c) the jeweler laughs, says "Sucker!" and starts to run
away? This is
assuming I'm not on a PvP server and can't kill him or her.
